title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 419/98 of 20 February 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 454/95 laying down detailed rules for intervention on the market in butter and cream and Regulation (EC) No 322/96 laying down detailed rules of application for the public storage of skimmed-milk powder
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 419/98 of 20 February 1998 amending Regulation (EC) No 454/95 laying down detailed rules for intervention on the market in butter and cream and Regulation (EC) No 322/96 laying down detailed rules of application for the public storage of skimmed-milk powder
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The second subparagraph of Article 5(3) of Regulation (EEC) No 454/95 and the second subparagraph of Article 4(6) of Regulation (EC) No 322/96 are hereby replaced by the following:
'The storage costs to be paid shall be the costs to be reimbursed by the intervention agency to the account of the Guarantee Section of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund (EAGGF) in accordance with Article 7(2)(a) and (b) of Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3597/90.`

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 February 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
